titles.title: Tax Fairness for All Families Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an increasingly larger earned income credit for families with more than 3 children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/11/2013--Introduced. Tax Fairness for All Families Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the earned income tax credit, to provide for an increased credit percentage for taxpayers with three or more qualifying children.
